Package CZ2002

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
CZ2002.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
This class is used to hold entire menu from alaCarte items as well as promotional sets
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shi Yuan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu()
    Creating two ArrayList, alaCarteList and promotionalSetList containing alaCarte items and promotional set respectively generate a list of menu for customers to see

    • findMenuItem

      public int findMenuItem​(int alaCarteId)
      this method is to find if the alaCarte menu item exist in the ArrayList consisting alaCarte items
      Parameters:
      alaCarteId - the unique identifier of each alaCarte menu item
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the alaCarte menu item if it exists, else return -1

    • findPromotionalSetItem

      public int findPromotionalSetItem​(int setId)
      this method is to find if the promotional set exist in the ArrayList consisting of promotional sets
      Parameters:
      setId - unique identifier for the promotional set
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the promotional set if it exists, else return -1
